div1.ab: The Ambassador of France in Washington, to Mister Minister of Foreign Affairs.
div1.p: The negro people of the United States have just launched a call to foreign nations to ask them for protection.
This document is the expression of the terror that weighs on a part of the population of this country.

Following the war of Secession, the negroes were declared citizens and the Government in the Southern States passed between their hands. They kept it until 1877, time in which the whites removed power from them, sometimes with lively force and either by fraud or by intimidation, hindering them from voting. Ever since then, this situation lasted: the negroes in fact did not vote at all.The State of Mississippi has just adjusted this situation in submitting the exercise of the right to vote to exams on the knowledge of the Federal Constitution, that has no worth for the whites and that will suffer to

remove the rights of the blacks. The Supreme Court decided that this clause of the Constitution of Mississipi, not applying to the negro race in the capacity of race, was constitutional. One can thus predict that it will be generalized.

In reality, all juridic guarantee is refused to the negroes. There is not need of another example that that of the Jury of Charleston does not condemn the individuals that, in Lake City last year, assassinated the Director of the Post and his family because he was negro, and it is remarkable that Judge Brawley who presided the seats all in severely blaming the authors of the crime declared that the authorities who had named this Director of the Post were equally responsable.

Last April 23rd, a certain Samuel Hose assassinated a cultivator and violated his wife. The whites took possession of him, burned him alive, cut up his body and sold the pices to the bids in the middle of 2000 people. He was found by journalists to excuse the popular violence and the same day two other negroes of which a pastor, were hung in the same region, without committing any crime.
Since then, there has not been one day without us having learned that one or more negroes were assassinated. I will give to you

an example of the death of the negro Pevug and his wife in Atlanta, the assassinators committed at the end of March in Arkansas in Texarkana: the number is unknown, the triple lynchage in Texas in Houston that just took place in these last few days, the murders committed in Griffin (Georgia): there, there was formed an association to oblige the facotries to refuse to employ blacks without defense are drowned. Finally these past few days, in Fayetteville (Gc) an inoffensive negro was taken from his own house and killed without reason.

It is not surprising the the negroes are arming themselves and dream of vengeance. It is just as one saw pastor Rausom of the Methodist Church dare to speak in the pulpit about using dynamite against the whites. But this excess of speech can only bring new crimes. Other remedies are put in advance to conjure this situation. The first and the most natural was the political influence of the blacks always being brought to the side of the Republicans, maybe it would be good to bring it to the side of the democrats, the Southern States belonging to this party.

Others like the Bishop H.M.Turner proclaimed that the unique remedy was the complete separation of whites and blacks and that those who would have to emigrate to Africa and found a Republic there, Africa to the Africans.

Others finally proposed to construct industrial villages in the North where one would not employ any white worker. I have fear that this humanitarian project only hides a means for certain factories to procure the workforce to work well.

Whatever it be, numerous negro families in the South leave the country and as there 8 to 10 million blacks in the United States, that the natality in this race is considerable one can predict that from here in a few years a redoubtable problem will be posed to the country, that may see a new servile war./.
